title: [Health] Untreated Autism Spectrum Disorder Tied to Alcohol, Drug Abuse. An analysis of nearly 6,600 people found that those with autism had a significantly higher risk for substance use disorder (SUD) than those without autism (adjusted hazard ratio 2.33, 95% CI 1.89-2.87)
[Health] Metformin-induced weight loss in patients with or without type 2 diabetes/prediabetes: A retrospective cohort study
